Articles.Content:
As the title says. Is there a nicely formatted chart of all the planets with their orbital mechanics displayed at once for comparison? (I've been googling already, I know the information exists on the wiki, I'm just hoping to find a nice concise tool)

Edited April 20, 2015 by Errol

Here:

http://tinyurl.com/kspinforip

I haven't updated it since 0.18.2, admittredly, but I don't think the parameters of the worlds have changed since then.
